channel.title: List of Very cool and Helpful Opensource Freeware.
channel.description:
Here is a list of free opensource programs and freeware that can help in more ways than you can imagine.
Please feel free to add a list if you know of any good reliable programs that can help all of us.
Like photoshop and in some ways better with a GUI exactly like Photoshop now: Gimp [url]https://www.gimp.org/[/url]
Like Adobe After-effects Jashaka [url]https://jahshaka.org/[/url]
Like Maya and 3dMax: Blender [url]https://www.blender.org/[/url]
A Video Transcoder (My opinion of the ultimate transcoder) Media-Coder [url]https://mediacoder.sourceforge.net/[/url]
Like Microsoft Office but just as good and pretty much visually the same: [url]https://www.openoffice.org/[/url]
Copy Youtube videos for free in HD 1080p: [url]https://www.youtubedownloaderhd.com/[/url]
Registry fixer for free no adware or viruses: [url]https://www.ccleaner.com/[/url]
Videoplayer everyone loves: VLC [url]https://www.videolan.org/vlc/[/url] Media Player Classic [url]https://mpc-hc.sourceforge.net/[/url]

item.title: List of Very cool and Helpful Opensource Freeware.
item.dc:creator: jambo
item.description:
Burbinator:

Oh yes, music.
foobar2000: foobar2000.org

It’s flexible, customizable, has loads of addons, and has a very low memory usage.

hypnotek:

+1 Foobar2k is the best audio playback utility i have ever come across. There is so much you can do with it if you just explore for a few hours.

^This

item.dc:creator: ZHX_1138
item.description:
Level:

I was pointing out that it was not open source.

But, I mentioned on my first post that I would like everyone to include freeware that is reliable and beneficial to the black mesa community.

Thank You for your correction Level

Update: Does anybody know of a freeware that can remove DRM from Windows Media Video
Movie. You know the digital copies that we buy with our dvds

Also Level the youtube downloader was already mentions… 1st post!.

I was pointing out that it was not open source.

item.title: List of Very cool and Helpful Opensource Freeware.
item.dc:creator: ZHX_1138
item.description:
Evil-Police:

Blender sucks, go with XSI Mod Tool

Not open source, but it’s freeware.

But this was made useing blender so how can this suck dude. Maybe you need to try and learn :

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YE7VzlLtp-4
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ff8pYTBGAo8

UPDATE TO EVERYONE:
Also does anybody know of a FREEWARE that removes DRM from wmv and itunes movies?

item.description:

https://www.7-zip.org/

AbiWord - A Word like program.
https://www.abisource.com/

Handbrake - In cooperation with DVD43 can rip DVDs as well as convert between MP4, AVI, and OGG.
https://handbrake.fr/
https://www.dvd43.com/
